review: I can't get the Netflix to work :/ otherwise it would be 5 stars
author: Devon Cordell

review: The Fire Stick was very easy to install and it works great! Excellent value. Two Thumbs Up! The only issue I have is not with the product itself. It's with Amazon Prime. While you can buy the Fire Stick with a gift card, you can't pay for Amazon Prime that way. That is VERY disappointing. As such, I probably won't keep Prime after the free trail. I will go with Netflix.
author: Michael Murray

review: Amazing technology.  Great picture, no internet glitches, and lots of choice of items to watch.
author: Billy McCalister

review: If some instructions came with it, it might be work better.  At this point I would not recommend to a friend.
author: Danny Burchette

review: Pretty awesome. Making any tv smart & so easy to install!
author: A

review: I love it, It's a great investment about to buy a second one for my other Television.
